alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 15 at 11:20AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Wisconsin, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until noon CDT. * IMPACTS...Some roads remain closed due to flooding. Law enforcement reported that County M still has 8 to 10 inches of water on the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1114 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported some roads still being impacted by high water. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain fell. The rain has ended for the day. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Thorp, Loyal, Greenwood, Lynn, Reseburg, Willard, Granton, Highway 73 And 98, Sterling Avenue And Starks Road, Christie, Mead Lake, Seven Sister Mounds, County Roads H And K, The Blue Swamp, Veefkind, Eidsvold, Chili Corners, Chili and Junction. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
